s.text: USAT was the only paper to lead with the collapse of the Yamaichi brokerage yesterday, but today all the papers give front-page play to its aftermath: a 4.5% plummet in the Tokyo stock market.
Police Chief: The chief was caught leasing a luxury apartment for less than half its fair price (his roommate, another officer, told the landlord they needed the space for an undercover operation).

TV Marti journalists say the job would be great if not for one thing: Since Fidel Castro blocks reception in Cuba, very nearly no one is watching.
